channel.title: XP rates changing (disturbed source)
channel.description:
Hi, I just got my Disturbed source-client. I'm going through and changing alot of things. I can't seem to be able to change the xp rates? The only place I can find to possibly change the xp rates doesn't do anything Example: "public static final int XP_RATE = 1000; // x75 for combat, x50 for skills public static final int SKILLING_XP_RATE = 1500; public static final int COMBAT_RATE = 2500;"
I changed it to 100,1500,and 2500. It didn't do anything. The "//x75 for combat, x50 for skills" was already there and was previous settings. Help please? This is my first time coding a matrix source. Don't rip me to hard.

item.title: XP rates changing (disturbed source)
item.dc:creator: @Statik Statik
item.description:
@Statik wrote:

Hi, I just got my Disturbed source-client.
I’m going through and changing alot of things. I can’t seem to be able to change the xp rates?
The only place I can find to possibly change the xp rates doesn’t do anything
Example:
“public static final int XP_RATE = 1000; // x75 for combat, x50 for skills
public static final int SKILLING_XP_RATE = 1500;
public static final int COMBAT_RATE = 2500;”

I changed it to 100,1500,and 2500.
It didn’t do anything. The “//x75 for combat, x50 for skills” was already there and was previous settings.
Help please?
This is my first time coding a matrix source.
Don’t rip me to hard.

Read full topic
